root.name: rect()
root.description: Draws a rectangle to the screen. A rectangle is a four-sided shape with every angle at ninety degrees. The first two parameters set the location, the third sets the width, and the fourth sets the height. The origin is changed with the rectMode() function.

parameter.label: x
parameter.description: int or float: x-coordinate of the rectangle

parameter.label: y
parameter.description: int or float: y-coordinate of the rectangle

parameter.label: width
parameter.description: int or float: width of the rectangle

parameter.label: height
parameter.description: int or float: height of the rectangle
